snippet: The bride is an assistant in the education department of Clinique; the bridegroom is a liaison between tanker owners and charterers at Poten & Partners, a New York ship brokerage.
lead_paragraph: The bride is an assistant in the education department of Clinique; the bridegroom is a liaison between tanker owners and charterers at Poten & Partners, a New York ship brokerage.

headline.seo: Margaret Lawson, David Barrett Jr.: Weddings
